name: photo-of-the-day-in-your-face
title: Photo Of The Day: In Your Face
author: Christy Frink
contentEncoded:
Flickr user edwin.donnelly snagged an impressive shot of this little guy, an African Crowned Crane, at the Nashville Zoo yesterday. Though we kind of think it’s begging for an LOLcat caption, we love it the way it is: shocked, curious, and exotic.
